text: Alaha ne kise bade de sine vica do dila nahim rakho. Ate na tuhadi'am patani'am nu jinham nu tusim zihara (mam di pitha kahina) karade ho, tuhadi mam bana'i'a ate na tuhade muha baule (palaka) putara nu tuhada beta bana'i'a si. Iha sabha tuhade apane kahina di'am galam hana. Ate alaha saci gala akhada hai ate uha sidha raha dikha'unda hai
